translations.translation: How will you know what the Night of Determination is?
And what do you know what the Night of Power is?
Would that you knew what the Night of Destiny is!
And what have you understood, what the Night of Destiny is!
And what will make you know what the Night of Al-Qadr is
And what will make you comprehend what the grand night
And what shall teach thee what is the Night of Power?
Ah, what will convey unto thee what the Night of Power is!
And what will make you comprehend what the Night of Destiny is?
And what shall make thee know that which the night of Power is?
And what will show you what is the Night of Ordainment?
And what will explain to thee what the night of power is?
And what will make you know what the night of Al-Qadr (Decree) is?
What could let you know what the Night of Honor is!
But what will convey to you what the Night of Decree is?
And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree?
[97:2] And what will show you, [what] will make known to you, O Muhammad (s), what the Night of Ordainment is? — [intended] to emphasise its great status and to provoke marvel at it.
(Ah, what will convey unto thee) Muhammad-this is said out of glorification of this night-(what the Night of Power is) what the merit of the Night of Power is!

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: لذلك أبهم سبحانه على حبيبه صلى الله عليه وسلم، فقال: { وَمَآ أَدْرَاكَ } أي: أيّ شيء أعلمك من مقتضيات بشريتك ولوازم ناستوك { مَا لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ } [القدر: 2] إذ هي خارجة عن مدارك عالم الناسوت
